subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: A shrewd move by Denny Hamlin’s crew chief gave him a chance to steal a race Sunday, and the driver did so, beating out Jeff Gordon by less than a car length.
snippet: A shrewd move by Denny Hamlin’s crew chief gave him a chance to steal a race Sunday, and the driver did so, beating out Jeff Gordon by less than a car length.
